title: Ticket #709: GitTrac: Can't delete attachments from setup_style
description: Attachments on http://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/setup_style can't be deleted. If you try, you get "Server error!" because of "Premature end of script headers: index.cgi". Deleting attachments from tickets works fine. There is now a glut of cvstrac.*.css files that should be deleted (2-6, leave 7 alone), but can't be.
creator: adesmet
